solution_line_template: She will spend {num_small_bulbs}*${cost_small_bulb}=${<<{num_small_bulbs}*{cost_small_bulb}={cost_small_bulbs_total}>>}{cost_small_bulbs_total} on small light bulbs.
In total she will spend ${cost_small_bulbs_total}+${cost_large_bulb}=${<<{cost_small_bulbs_total}+{cost_large_bulb}={total_cost_bulbs}>>}{total_cost_bulbs} on the 4 light bulbs.
